Extras (720p, DD 2.0 @192, 640MB/35min in total, Subs; Eng, Cze, Hun, Pol, Rus)
My Least Favorite Career: Jason Bateman, Jason Sudekis, Charlie Day, Julie Bowen, Colin Farrell, Jennifer Aniston and director Seth Gordon...
Surviving a Horrible Boss: Bateman, Sudeikis, Day and Gordon give tips on how to deal with your own horrible boss and chat about workplace misery.
Being Mean is So Much Fun: Aniston, Farrell and Kevin Spacey talk about cutting loose, having fun and embracing their dark, deviant sides.
The Making of the Horrible Bosses Soundtrack: Gordon and composer Christopher Lennertz bring together musicians from the Beastie Boys, Pearl Jam and the Dave Matthews Band.
Deleted Scenes: A decent selection of deleted scenes that includes two alternate openings.
